comment: A bra-ket juxtaposition, expressed as ` <. A | B >. ` in Dirac notation, equals the inner product of the vectors. Based on definition of bra in [Prugovecki] p. 186. (Contributed by NM, 15-May-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
